duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting Store Manager and Assistant Store Manager in achieving retail store targets by driving sales.
Opening and closing the store in the absence of other management and ensuring the store trades safely and legally.
Delivering sales through friendly and efficient customer service to ensure a fun and enjoyable shopping experience for customers.
Assisting customers with their queries using product knowledge and demonstrating Claire's products.
Assisting with store deliveries, visual merchandising, stock takes, markdowns, promotions, and ear piercing (with full training provided).
Ensuring the store looks presentable and inviting to customers.
